Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class PolygonAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractPointedAnnotation
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
              • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.PolygonAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBackgroundColor, HasBorderOptions, HasEventsHandler, HasExtendedBorderOptions, HasExtendedShadowOptions, HasRotation, HasShadowOptions, IsDefaultsAbstractCircleBasedAnnotation, IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation, IsDefaultsAnnotation, IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler, IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsEventsHandler, IsDefaultsExtendedBorderOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsExtendedShadowOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsPolygonAnnotation, IsDefaultsRotationHandler, IsDefaultsShadowOptionsHandler
    public final class PolygonAnnotation
extends AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation
implements IsDefaultsPolygonAnnotation, HasExtendedBorderOptions
    Implements a POLYGON annotation which draws a polygon in the a chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
        PolygonAnnotation()
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance.
      The annotation id is calculated automatically.
        PolygonAnnotation​(String id)
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        PolygonAnnotation​(String id, IsChart chart)
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id)
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      private PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id, IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the native object and defaults passed as argument.
        PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id, IsChart chart)
      Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
      (package private) PolygonAnnotation​(NativeObject nativeObject, IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
      Creates the object wrapping an existing native object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolygonAnnotation

        public PolygonAnnotation()
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance.
        The annotation id is calculated automatically.
        See Also:
        AnnotationType.createId()

      • PolygonAnnotation

        public PolygonAnnotation​(String id)
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object, as string

      • PolygonAnnotation

        public PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id)
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object

      • PolygonAnnotation

        public PolygonAnnotation​(String id,
                         IsChart chart)
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object, as string
        chart - chart instance related to the plugin options

      • PolygonAnnotation

        public PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id,
                         IsChart chart)
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object
        chart - chart instance related to the plugin options

      • PolygonAnnotation

        private PolygonAnnotation​(AnnotationId id,
                          IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
        Creates a polygon annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the native object and defaults passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object
        defaultValues - default options instance
